TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SoapBinding extends System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension

Docs.summary: Represents an extension added to a within an XML Web service. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This class specifies that the data transmission will use the SOAP protocol version 1.1.
For more information about specifying protocols for XML Web services, see [[\<topic://cpconbuildingaspnetwebservices>]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01dfc27c-c68e-4910-a0aa-5e4c2a766b0c). For more information about Web Services Description Language (WSDL), see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
## Examples [!code-cs[SoapOperationBinding#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.web.services.de_14_1.cs)] [!code-cpp[SoapOperationBinding#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.web.services.de_14_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[SoapOperationBinding#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.web.services.de_14_1.vb)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes an instance of the class.
Gets the URI for the standard protocol specifying HTTP transmission of SOAP data. This field is constant.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The field value is "http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http/".
## Examples [!code-cs[SoapOperationBinding#5](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/f-system.web.services.de_4_1.cs)] [!code-cpp[SoapOperationBinding#5](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/f-system.web.services.de_4_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[SoapOperationBinding#5](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/f-system.web.services.de_4_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: Gets the URI for the XML namespace of the class. This field is constant.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The field value is "http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/".
## Examples [!code-cpp[SoapBodyBinding_Parts#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/f-system.web.services.de_1_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[SoapBodyBinding_Parts#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/f-system.web.services.de_1_1.vb)] [!code-cs[SoapBodyBinding_Parts#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/f-system.web.services.de_1_1.cs)]

Docs.summary: Gets the binding schema that is to be used to transmit data by using the SOAP protocol version 1.1.
Docs.value: An <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> object that represents the binding schema that is to be used to transmit data by using the SOAP protocol version 1.1.

Docs.summary: Specifies the type of SOAP binding used by the current .
Docs.value: One of the values. The default is .

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the URI with the specification for HTTP transmission of SOAP data.
Docs.value: A string value representing the URI for the specification for data transmission by means of SOAP. The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format:
## Remarks This required property value will generally be the same as that of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBinding.HttpTransport> field. However, this property value can be any URI for data-transmission specifications, for example, SMTP or FTP.
## Examples SoapBinding_SoapOperationBinding#2
